emailTemplate.subject: Application Submitted Successfully – Next Steps
emailTemplate.body:
Dear Parent,

We are pleased to inform you that your child’s application has been successfully submitted through our online portal.

Kindly note that we may require some mandatory documents or information. We would contact you over email or your registered mobile number.

If you have any questions or need assistance, feel free to contact our admissions team.

Thank you for choosing Santhosha Vidhyalaya

Warm regards,
Admissions Coordinator
Santhosha Vidhyalaya
